posts.title: Thoughts on JavaScript
posts.content: I love a hot cuppa Java with my donuts. Particularly when I'm reading the script for my new movie. Java and Script, mmmm, delicious!

posts.title: Why React??
posts.content: Why do you have to React to everything? I mean all I said was that the reactor was gonna blow. What's the fuss about?

posts.title: This was funny
posts.content: So, I saw this video on Youtube and this guy was teaching something called "Naahd Daaht Jee Esss". I mean, if you have to teach French, do it properly!

posts.title: React Hooks
posts.content: So React has introduced a superb new way to empower function components with state, side effects and other things.
